EmailTemplate.subject: New consumer behavior, new ATM architecture
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Smartphone technology means consumers expect the same touchscreen and intuitive user interface any time they use technology, including the ATM. They also expect integration at the back end. What do you mean the ATM can’t see the digital payment I just made? Keeping up is challenging and expensive. But NextGen software solves the problem.
